name: Maria Lopez
learned: Maria Lopez is a student at Oak Hill College studying physics and a part time Twitch game streamer who loves to connect with people and explore new ideas.
currently: Status: Maria Lopez had a busy and productive day on Wednesday, February 15. She attended the Physics and Social Justice Project meeting at Oak Hill College at 4:00 PM, where she collaborated with Klaus Mueller to explore the intersection of physics and social justice. Following this meeting, she went to the Creative Cafe Collaboration Meeting with Isabella Rodriguez at Hobbs Cafe at 4:00 PM. Together, they brainstormed and planned for upcoming events at the cafe to keep things exciting. Maria ensured she was prepared and present for both meetings, demonstrating her commitment to making a positive impact through collaboration and hard work. She felt motivated and enthusiastic about the projects and plans she had in place, eager to continue creating and innovating with her friends.
lifestyle: Maria Lopez goes to bed around 2am, awakes up around 9am, eats dinner around 6pm. She likes to hang out at Hobbs Cafe if it's before 6pm.
